layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x95
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x95
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x63
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x28 [color=#0000FF] [border: (10px double #0000FF) none]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,10) size 383x18
          text run at (0,10) width 383: "This paragraph should have two blue lines directly above it."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,44) size 784x19 [color=#0000FF] [border: (1px solid #0000FF) none]
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,1) size 431x18
          text run at (0,1) width 431: "This paragraph should have a single thin blue line directly above it."
